name: Digital Health Access
description: Health Education and consultation platform for users to interract with doctors,counselors and other health professionals.

SDGs.evidenceText: We are providing access to a consortium of health professionals accross the globe so that people no matter how remore you are can access a specialist services that might not be readily available in their domain. Access to profesional conselors is a big issue in Ghana and for that matter Africa. making these proffessionals accessible will help people gain the right solutions to health and psychological problems

Access to health education is key to national development. Instead of people seeking answers from social media they can obtain those answers from professionals and will help them learn a lot about their health.
